lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The talks which broke down yesterday were in the key North Wuerttemberg/North Baden area, which generally sets the trend for the rest of the country.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The employers have not made an official offer on cutting the working week, but sources involved in the negotiations say that they are working on the basis of a possible half-hour reduction from next year and a pay increase of 2.7 pct in 1987 and of 1.5 pct in 1988.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: IG-Metall has already been staging a series of "warning strikes" to press home demands for the 35-hour week.

lst.name: sentence
